name: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
description:
After your character uses a skill: This card will accumulate 1 Treasure Clue.
If this card has stored 3 Treasure Clues, then discard this card and draw 3 cards.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character uses a skill:</color> This card will accumulate 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Treasure Clue</color>.\nIf this card has stored 3 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Treasure Clues</color>, then discard this card and draw 3 cards.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character uses a skill:</color> This card will accumulate 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Treasure Clue</color>.\nIf this card has stored 3 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Treasure Clues</color>, then discard this card and draw 3 cards.
storytext: Strange Seelie capable of guiding people toward treasure. Legend has it that some individuals know how to communicate with these Seelie...
